endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of clinical trials matching specified criteria.
Submit an anonymized patient profile for trial matching analysis.
Fetch the recommended trials for a specific anonymized patient.
Update the enrolled status of a specific clinical trial based on patient participation.
View the qualification criteria for a specific clinical trial.
Submit feedback about the service or specific trials to improve operations.
Retrieve statistics on clinical trial participation and outcomes.
Search for clinical trials using detailed filtering options.
Remove an anonymized patient profile from the system.
Update contact information for trial coordinators.
